Name: French Tear No. 1
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: Rum-laced and fruity. Altogether very gluggable.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 2000 at Quo Vadis in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of French Tear No. 1 contains 158 calories
